title: Unhandled error while processes req/response
body:
### Description
Started a new archive sync on medalla and got the following error a few times:

```
12:29:42.098 ERROR - Unhandled error while processes req/response

 java.lang.NullPointerException: null

 │                                                                      │                  │         │       
     at io.netty.channel.AbstractChannelHandlerContext.invokeChannelRead(AbstractChannelHandlerContext.java:379) [netty-all-4.1.51.Final.jar:4.1.51.Final]
```

**Frequency:** [What percentage of the time does it occur?]
It seemed to happen a few times before block 300

### Versions (Add all that apply)
* Software version: teku/v0.12.7-dev-eee6bc23/linux-x86_64/oracle_openjdk-java-14
Running in Amzon EKS

### Additional Information
Srt for the lack of details, I can't seem to find anymore logs of it.
